com.metreeca.gate

Interface Digest

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PBKDF2Digest

    public interface Digest
    Secret digest.

    Digests and verifies secrets.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Supplier<Digest> digest()
      Retrieves the default digest factory.
      String digest(String secret)
      Digests a secret.
      boolean verify(String secret, String digest)
      Verifies a secret.

    • Method Detail

      • digest

        static Supplier<Digest> digest()
        Retrieves the default digest factory.
        Returns:
        the default digest factory, which throws an exception reporting the digest as undefined

      • digest

        String digest(String secret)
        Digests a secret.
        Parameters:
        secret - the secret to be digested
        Returns:
        the digest derived from secret
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if secret is null

      • verify

        boolean verify(String secret,
               String digest)
        throws IllegalArgumentException
        Verifies a secret.
        Parameters:
        secret - the secret to be verified
        digest - the digest derived from the expected secret
        Returns:
        true if secret matches the expected digest; false otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either secret or digest is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if digest is non a valid digest representation
